unnormalised: Hey, did you know Dr. Verma at AIIMS is doing some crazy research on gene editing? Apparently, they're aiming to cure genetic diseases, like, maybe even Huntington's!
normalised: Hey, did you know Doctor Verma at A-I-I-M-S is doing some crazy research on gene editing? Apparently, they're aiming to cure genetic diseases, like, maybe even Huntington's!
